snippet: The tenor Paul Appleby and the violinist Augustin Hadelich are named as winners of the 2012 Martin E. Segal awards, honoring emerging artists associated with Lincoln Center.
abstract: The tenor Paul Appleby and the violinist Augustin Hadelich are named as winners of the 2012 Martin E. Segal awards, honoring emerging artists associated with Lincoln Center.

headline.main: Tenor and Violinist Receive Martin E. Segal Awards
headline.print_headline: Tenor and Violinist Win Segal Awards
